import React, { Component } from "react"; import classes from "./connexion.module.css" import { Link} from 'react-router-dom' class Connexion extends Component { state = { adresseMail : "", password : "" } render() { const adresseMail = this.state.adresseMail const password = this.state.password console.log() return (

CONNECTEZ VOUS

this.setState({adresseMail:event.target.value})} type="email" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter email" />
this.setState({password:event.target.value})} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter password" />

Forgot password?

PAS ENCORE INSCRIT, CLIQUEZ ICI

) } } export default Connexion
